name: C. V. Gibert
biography: The maker of the service, C.V. Gibert, first registered in Paris on May 24th, 1887 at 133 rue du Temple.  He later moved to 4 rue Beranger.  He either worked for or was bought out by Tetard Freres, a well-known silversmithing firm listed at this same address.  Not much is currently know about Givert;  it is possible that he continued working for Tetard Freres, but without being allowed to mark his own pieces (using the Tetard mark).
